name: Upon the Stars
description:
In "Upon the Stars" you control a star on its way through space to find its way back to the orbit of its homeplanet. Being a star is not as easy as it seems though, since space and the different planets you are trespassing are filled with various obstacles and traps to stop you from finding your way back.

"Upon the Stars" is a challenging singleplayer arcade experience that uses an easy to pick up - hard to master control scheme. There are 5 challenging stages with their own themes and varying difficulty. Getting through each stage requires practice and patience. Mastering the controls and the layout of each stage is necessary to progress the game. 

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Features:

  • Easy controls - play the game only using your left mouse button  or spacebar
  • Easy to learn - Hard to master
  • 5 challenging stages - more to come in the future
  • Unlockable Colors to customize your star
  • Catchy soundtrack that is tied to the level design by talented artists:
    • TeknoAxe
    • Aries Beats
    • Eva

To play the game, just extract the folder and run the UponTheStars.exe.

This is the first game I've ever released and I'm happy to finally release it.   
Developing it in my freetime has been a lot of fun and I hope playing it is just as fun for you as it was for me.

The game is soon to be released for free (with ads) on Google Play and maybe on Steam in the future.

Thanks for reading!

- Thomas
